• All women throughout labour have the right to a birth companion of their choice. All institutions need to have
baseline protocols for including birth companions - cases where they aren’t allowed should be the exception
and should be centred around patient safety. These should be clearly communicated to all using the facility
and all staff, including security and clerical staff.
